message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you consider meeting me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $1200000 is a good price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. Can you consider $1325000?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $1300000. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can meet you at $1320000, which is the highest I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1295000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $1325000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, though. I can meet you at $1290000. Can you consider that?
